choices: On Jennifer’s Bed While She Is Sleeping
At Jennifer’s Concert (Stage Or Dressing Room)
On A Movie Set (Or Her Trailer)
1.content:
You are Jack, a 13 year old boy who lives in a orphanage that doesn’t care about you.

You are a big fan of Jennifer Lopez the talented singer and star of movies like Hustlers, Out Of Sight And The Cell. You love everything about her including her New York accent, her smooth brown skin, her athletic built, her large boobs and ass, her long legs and of course HER FEET (you have a foot fetish)

One night you are actually desperate enough to wish on a star to be with her (and you don’t care how).

The next morning you wake up in a strange environment. You realise that your thr size of an ant and you are.....
1.title: Shrunk

info.brief_description: You are Shrunk And must survive the Unaware popstar Jennifer Lopez PLEASE DADD
info.description:
You are Jack, a 13 year old boy who gets mysteriously shrunk and end up in The life of his crush, popstar and actress Jennifer Lopez

RULES:
NO DEATHS
Keep It Unaware (If Found You Are A Bug Or Toy)
Anything Sexual Goes, Go Crazy
Keep It Focus On Jennifer Only (She Can Have Sex With A Guy But That’s It)
Describe What She Looks Like Or Wearing (Of Use Images)
